Recommended Treatment: Observation (no adjuvant therapy) per NCCN guidelines for Stage IA, Grade 1 endometrioid carcinoma
Description: Surgical pathology shows a FIGO grade 1 endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the endometrium with superficial myometrial invasion of less than one-third, no lymphovascular invasion, and negative lymph nodes (AJCC pT1b pNx).
Patient Notes: Your report indicates a low-grade endometrial cancer confined to the inner muscle layer of the uterus that was completely removed by surgery. No cancer was found in your lymph nodes. Because this is a low-risk tumor, no further treatment is recommended right now, and we will follow you with regular check-ups.

verification.assessment: The extracted data accurately reflect the key diagnostic, staging, and management details from the report. A few additional details (tumor dimensions, nodal counts, LVSI status) could enhance completeness but do not affect the core extraction.
